title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Dec 12 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 12 December 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the PrisonPlanet.tv web site :: The Great Congressional Budget Compromise Of 2013 And Other Fiscal Insanities. Plus, Dr. Ron Paul Joins Us To Discuss Rise Of The Liberty Movement and The Potential To Turn The Tide.

On the Thursday, December 12 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Jones examines the unprecedented police state rollout in New York City in the run up to the Super Bowl, and takes a look at Homeland Security's decision to finally fire the man that advocated a genocidal race war. 

Alex also analyzes the great "congressional budget compromise" and how it still ends up screwing the American taxpayer, and continues outlining the ill effects stemming with the Obamacare train wreck. 

Joining Alex today is former Congressman Ron Paul. The stalwart libertarian and three time presidential contender will discuss Obama's actions becoming more and more dictatorial, the Republican budget sellout, the out-of-control rise of police corruption and the slow motion implosion of the American dollar.

This upload is the Prison Planet "members' edit" -- the whole broadcast in one .MP3 with scheduled commercial breaks taken out. I hope to be back to doing my normal edit tomorrow.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
